page.title: 13Home Game
page.content:
Jill's favourite game.
One of the favourite games that I play at home is Sevensy's.This is a game played with a ball.You start by throwing the ball up onto the wall and catching it, then you throw it up and let it bounce.It is called Sevensy's because you start on 7 and gradually work down to 1.These are the actions: {SEVEN}:Throw your ball on the wall and catch it.{SIX}:Throw your ball onto the wall let it bounce and catch it,{ {FIVE}:bounce the ball five times.{ {FOUR:}throw the ball under your leg and catch.{THREE}:bounce the ball onto the floor let it bounce on the wall and catch it.{TWO}:throw the ball up in the air, bounce it and catch then repeat.{ONE}:throw the ball in the air and catch it.
